body_html:
I think it would be good to figure out the issue with __linux not being set properly.

Can you try:
touch /tmp/foo.cc
cpp -dM -std=c++11 /tmp/foo.cc

vs
cpp -dM /tmp/foo.cc

Save the output of each separately and attach both files? It will be good to see which macros are actually defined in both cases.

body:
I think it would be good to figure out the issue with __linux not being set properly.

Can you try:
`touch /tmp/foo.cc`
`cpp -dM -std=c++11 /tmp/foo.cc`

vs
`cpp -dM /tmp/foo.cc`

Save the output of each separately and attach both files?  It will be good to see which macros are actually defined in both cases.
